ISSUE.TITLE: Build promote: Display environment
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: With drone 1.1.0 I can promote (previously called deploy) a build with: ``` drone build promote [command options] <repo/name> <build> <environment> ``` where I can specify a target environment. In the web interface however, I can't seem to find out which environment a build has been promoted to. I only see: ``` user-xxx promoted `branch` ``` I would like instead: ``` user-xxx promoted `branch` to `env` ``` (or any other way to display that info.) I remember drone 0.8 used to display target environments when running a `drone deploy`. Thanks
